entry.content:
I’m Winrich, 40 years old. I entered the futures market in 2008 but unfortunately encountered the subprime mortgage crisis. I then switched to run a clothing business for years. When the COVID-19 pandemic erupted in 2020, clothing orders dropped sharply, so I decided to return to the familiar futures market and trade using my self-developed trading methodology.

Developing Cycle Trading Methodology

From operating the clothing business, I learned risk management and cost control skills. I applied these ideas to trading and devised the cycle trading methodology.

Its core concepts are:

  • Analyze historical price trends to determine market cycles
  • Identify cycle multiple patterns
  • Take corresponding trading strategies based on cycle analysis

This trading methodology assisted me to rejoin futures trading and achieve steady profits.

Success Stories

Let me provide two examples to demonstrate applying the cycle trading methodology:

Case One: Glass Futures Contract

In spring 2020, with the benefits of COVID-19 and construction peak season, the glass 2009 contract price surged from CNY1820/ton to a historic high of CNY2450/ton.

Based on cycle analysis, I went long around CNY2100 with about 70 tons. I timely locked profits when price hit CNY2450. By closing out positions at CNY2300 during the pullback, I gained about CNY350,000 in profits, around 1.75 times of the investment.

Case Two: Soda Ash Futures Contract

In the first half of 2022, soda ash futures plunged from CNY6950/ton to a historic low of CNY2860/ton. I judged there was more room to fall and went short around CNY5500 with about 45 tons.

After hitting the bottom at CNY2860, I covered positions at CNY3300 and obtained around CNY1.05 million in profits, about 3.5 times of the investment.

Looking Ahead

Looking forward, I will continue optimizing this trading methodology to pursue long-term steady profits. I will also share my trading insights continuously through my blog.

Thank you for reading and I look forward to advancing together on this trading journey!
